title: AWS Lambda to AWS IoT Core
description: Create a Lambda publishing into IoT topic, triggering an action calling another Lambda.

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This sample project demonstrates how to use an AWS Lambda Function to publish messages into AWS IoT Core topic and get a rule triggered by a condition to to forward and process relevant messages into a second Lambda. This pattern is leveraging CloudWatch logs to ease the debugging and visibility into the processed messages.

The function are written in Python and the infrastructure is described with AWS CDK v2 in Typescript. The patterns also shows an effective way to manage Python dependencies through Docker built image and requiements.txt file.
